title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Strategies for Utilizing Practice-Centered Instructional Design Tools

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain a framework for analyzing rational criteria (tool suitability) and situational factors (individual preferences) when selecting instructional design tools
Learners can establish digital/analog tool combination strategies for science education design and apply them to microlearning environments
Learners can evaluate their tool selection methods based on peer feedback and propose improvement plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
